description: Creates or replaces resource policy for an Object Lambda Access Point. For an example policy, see Creating Object Lambda Access Points in the Amazon S3 User Guide. The following actions are related to PutAccessPointPolicyForObjectLambda:

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID for the account that owns the specified Object Lambda Access Point.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Object Lambda Access Point.

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.description: Object Lambda Access Point resource policy document.
